title: U.S.- employment by industry 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Employment in thousands in the y axis.
The Employment in thousands is highest at Industry Education and health services and lowest at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
There is a difference of 35144.0 between the maximum Industry Education and health services and minimum Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
